meanings.definition: To distribute or transmit a video podcast.
meanings.sent1: She vodcasted her latest episode to her subscribers.
meanings.sent2: The company vodcasted their product launch event for everyone to see.
meanings.sent3: The cat vodcasted a video of itself playing with a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The sun vodcasted its rays across the sky, lighting up the world.
meanings.sent5: The teacher vodcasted the lesson to help students learn from home.

meanings.sent1: I watched a vodcasted episode of my favorite show last night.
meanings.sent2: The vodcasted content was available for viewing on the website.
meanings.sent3: The vodcasted recording of the concert captured all the excitement.
meanings.sent4: The vodcasted interview provided valuable insights into the topic.
meanings.sent5: The vodcasted file was easy to access and watch on my phone.
